posts.post_content:
I haven't posted this babble for awhile:

Free s/h.  Any form of payment accepted.  

Although PMs will be read and responded to, I very much prefer email at: [url]mybuddyinc@yahoo.com[/url]

You can also email me for better scans, questions, comments, suggestions, etc.

A few things, so I can keep this as organized as possible:

1 -- I will address all correspondences in the order of date/time delivery into my email box (including PMs).
2 -- Please Note:  I work evenings/nights, and keep somewhat odd hours. Therefore response time may vary depending when I am on the computer. However, all correspondences will be addressed.
3 -- “I’ll take it” will take precedent over ongoing correspondences.
4 –  Satisfaction guaranteed.

______________________________________

I have 50 commons up on ebay (sg713) that are listed at BIN $19.91 (Plus $2 s/h).

But, as an T206 "enabler" :) I will set "net54 price" at:

1 card -- 19, delivered.
3 or more cards -- 18, delivered. 

[url]http://www.ebay.com/sch/sg713/m.html?item=371806097816&ssPageName=STRK%3AMESELX%3AIT&rt=nc&_mPrRngCbx=1&_udlo=19.90&_udhi=19.91[/url]

:( Darn link shows all cards.  You can best get to the 19.91 ones by filtering "lowest first."  BUT, if anything else catches your eye, we probably can work something out. ;)

Thanks, Scott

PM Sent.

Edit: Just re-read your post. Email sent, since you prefer that.

I'll get a butt whooping from my fiancee later, but it will be worth it. Thank you very much for the deal! 

For fellow board members, I really enjoy working with this guy. Great person/collector. Highly recommended. 

To the person that beat me to the Hartsel Sovereign... 
[IMG]https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/564x/b6/e7/5d/b6e75da87e59903710dadc8b729607ba.jpg[/IMG]
Got my cards yesterday.  Very happy!  Thanks for a great deal.  Keep me  in mind for other Cincinnati Reds!  Thanks!
